title: Any help?

replies.body: I've been seeing quite a few of these 003 issues, and most players so far have been able to clear things up by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. Make sure you're running it with those two checked, and let me know.
